channel.title: Hold Up on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hold Up on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Apple’s Best New iOS 26 Feature Has Been on Pixel Phones for Years
item.description: The iPhone’s new software screens your calls using machine intelligence. Neat, but Google had the feature first—just like so many other features that rely on AI to work.
